00021 #ifndef COLLECTION_H_
00022 #define COLLECTION_H_
00023 
00024 
00025 #include "Object.h"
00026 #include "Iterator.h"
00027 #include "Hashable.h"
00028 
00029 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00030 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00031 
00047 template<class T>
00048 class Collection : public virtual Object {
00049 public:
00056     typedef bool(*FilterFunction)(const T&, Any&);
00057 public:
00058 
00059     virtual bool add(const T & t);
00060     virtual bool addAll(const Collection<T> & c);
00061     virtual void clear();
00062     virtual bool contains(const T & t) const = 0;
00063     virtual bool containsAll(const Collection<T> & c) const;
00064     virtual bool operator ==(const Collection<T> & c) const;
00065 
00066     virtual bool operator !=(const Collection<T> & c) const {
00067         return !(*this == c);
00068     }
00069     virtual sint hashCode() const = 0;
00070     virtual bool empty() const = 0;
00071     virtual Collection<T> filter(FilterFunction func, Any& clientData) = 0;
00072     virtual bool remove(const T & t);
00073     virtual bool removeAll(const Collection<T> & c);
00074     virtual bool retainAll(const Collection<T> & c);
00075     virtual std::size_t size() const = 0;
00076     virtual Array<T> toArray() const = 0;
00077 
00078     operator Array<T>() const {
00079         return toArray();
00080     }
00081 
00082     virtual Collection & operator<<(const T& t) { add(t); return *this; }
00083 };
00084 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00085 
00086 #endif  /* COLLECTION_H_ */
